channel.title: Help please :(
channel.description: Well... i got home today and i see there wasnt a player on my server. but i registerd it last night. soo i go onto moparscape server stat, look for my server.. and its gone...?? the server has been online all day/night. Its still 100% on run3 locus. so i was jsut wondering if anyone could help me figure out why it got deleted off mopar?

item.title: Help please :(
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

finalrevorsps:

i did that, The server was on mopar for the night, but when i got home from school it wasnt there. I checked the ips in the client i uploaded, checked the ip in my router and everythings good. People can login to my server, ive basically done everything that i could think of.

Perhaps your server went offline somehow.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please :(
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

You’d be best of asking MITB or a member of staff that can check it out for you.

Read full topic

i did that, The server was on mopar for the night, but when i got home from school it wasnt there. I checked the ips in the client i uploaded, checked the ip in my router and everythings good. People can login to my server, ive basically done everything that i could think of.

item.title: Help please :(
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“finalrevorsps, post:1, topic:460314”]Well… i got home today and i see there wasnt a player on my server. but i registerd it last night. soo i go onto moparscape server stat, look for my server… and its gone…?? the server has been online all day/night. Its still 100% on run3 locus.
so i was jsut wondering if anyone could help me figure out why it got deleted off mopar?[/quote]

Most likely because you never confirmed it, you have to do two things to finalize the procedure.
Firstly, go to the activation link that Moparscape provides you, from the computer/VPS that the server is hosted on.
Secondly, you need to make sure Moparscape is able to log into your server, this is to verify that it’s online.
I’d recommend going over the procedure again, and follow/read the steps correctly.

Read full topic
